title: Discover our
subtitle: HISTORY
intro: Discover how Snacks Yummies became the leading snack brand in Central America, from our humble beginnings to the present day.

items.title: Background
items.text: A brand with over 40 years in the market. Positioned as a line of the highest quality products. Generations of consumers have grown up with Zambos and made it a Honduran and iconic brand for Central Americans and nostalgic around the world.

items.title: Where and when was Zambos first produced?
items.text: Yummies, which started operations with 10 employees, was founded in San Pedro Sula in 1976 with the objective of supplying the Honduran market with varied and high-quality snacks.

items.title: Zambos Beginnings
items.text: Dinant began producing its first plantain chips from local raw materials, they were peeled at the production plant and cut into slices, like long and rectangular sticks. Then the brand 'Sambos' with an 'S' was created, which began to produce round plantain to differentiate itself from the Yummies family and then changed to the brand Zambos with 'Z'. It is here that the varieties of plantains that had the best resistance and performance began to be selected.

items.title: Raw Material
items.text: The plantain used in the production of Zambos is created from a graft of two plants. Adapted and developed over more than 30 years to be planted and grown in the microclimates in the plantations that Dinant has located in Nicaragua (Nandaime) and in the northern part of Honduras. This variety of plantain is the only one we use for Zambos.

items.title: Zambos Truck is Born
items.text: In June we started with a dream on wheels: the Zambos Truck project. We began touring cities and participating in private events, taking our flavors to where the fans were. What started as a mobile idea quickly became an experience that everyone wanted to have at their celebrations.

conclusion: Our history is a testament to innovation, quality, and commitment to our consumers. At Snacks Yummies, we continue to work every day to bring the best products to your table, always maintaining the authentic flavor that characterizes us.
